title: Sans-serif a bit classy
content:
I'm pretty sure I know this font, just not by name. I'm looking for the font in the image that reads " [marco polo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171117/http:/behance.vo.llnwd.net/profiles4/124703/projects/4787645/d0380d155bb9ea5c3447f2bd8b1a4ba1.png)". Your help is greatly appreciated, thank you.

Stone Sans Semi, maybe?
author: zerimar3

comments.content: Yes, I think **Stone Sans Semi** a bit artificially emboldened, is a very good choice ;)

Thanks for the info. **Stone Sans Semi** looks very close. I have one more. I'm looking to id this font in this image that says " [Celebrate Legendary](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171117/http:/darrincrescenzi.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/1032x687x287_roger_image-1032x687.jpg.pagespeed.ic.6JkNoVYgzP.jpg)". Any thoughts? Thanks!
